item.description:
"OUT OF LEFT FIELD: The Revolutionary Snake Ensemble, a writhing, horn-heavy group led by the Boston-based saxophonist and composer Ken Field, dresses in feathered masks and sequined robes and covers a broad range of funk- and New Orleans-inspired music... The group puts a funky spin on everything from Billy Idol to Ornette Coleman."
The New Yorker NIGHTLIFE PICK OF THE WEEK

"Their most focused, adventurous, and rollicking effort yet. Ken Field's Snakes march their jazzy New Orleans-style second line in slinking, swaggering new directions"
Boston Globe

http://fieldk.home.at...
item.name: Revolutionary Snake Ensemble - Plough & Stars
